txt.en:
'If you have come to purchase wine, I am afraid most of it is spoken for. Merchants from Minas Tirith have bought up my entire existing stock and almost all the product of the coming harvest. How much wine can one city drink?

'What I can offer you is work. There is plenty to do and not enough hands for the doing.'
Miruhir has many tasks that need doing in and around his vineyard.

You have completed all the tasks that Miruhir has set before you. He looks so happy he could hug you. He doesn't because you are sweaty, he is sweaty, and despite his gratitude he doesn't know you that well.

'What a gift you have for odd jobs! Could I convince you to stay on? Even for another day or so? Ah, you have other places to be. I understand.'

He tries not to look too disappointed but he is a forthright man who wears his heart upon his sleeve.
Miruhir has asked you to help with many tasks around the vineyard.\n\nComplete quests in and around Iáphel.
